title: HELP!!
body: uhm I don't mean to be rude here but wtf is going on? me and a few frends of mine have been banned until june 12 2016 all of a sudden.... is it something weve done? I haven't done anything at all I know it and neither  did they it then sadi seeyour email address to see wat you did wrong....... but nothing....... no email.... please help me thanks.

replies.body: Don't forget to check your junk folder. Quite often emails from riot go straight into junk.
hahaha rekt u noob u must be a scripter lololol
I don't have scripts? I don't even know where to get them or how please don't accuse me of something I am not thanks.
lol thatz wot evry persun that is a scriptor seys u lyar HAAHha rEKTrt!1ONE!1!

> [{quoted}](name=HekaRimjob,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KoQPQOgn,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-13T05:55:54.637+0000)
>
> lol thatz wot evry persun that is a scriptor seys u lyar HAAHha rEKTrt!1ONE!1!

Its a 1 month ban... people who hack are permanently suspended lol

You're going to have to contact Riot support, the Boards can't help you directly here.

Also check to see if your account was hacked or compromised: any things purchased in store you didn't buy, match history, etc.
